code: @PostConstruct public void setup() {     /**      * This workflow reads all files from the directory named "input",      * marshals them using the Camel marshalling features (simulation)      * and sends them to an external system (simulation)      * only if they contain the word "camel".      */     Flux.from(camel.from("file:input", InputStream.class)).flatMap(camel.to("direct:unmarshal", String.class)).filter(text -> text.contains("camel")).flatMap(camel.to("direct:send", String.class)).subscribe(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:unmarshal").convertBodyTo(String.class).log("Content marshalled to string: ${body}").     from("direct:send").log("Sending the file to an external system (simulation)"). }
